long_description: With a comfort-oriented geometry, the 20-speed Diamondback Century 3 Bike combines comfort and speedy performance thanks to a carbon frame and dependable Shimano Tiagra components. Carbon frame is designed to provide excellent handling, delivering a lightweight, strong and responsive platform for maximum efficiency. Full-carbon fork with tapered alloy steerer uses continuous fibers to maximize strength, stiffness and handling response, all with little weight penalty. Shimano Tiagra shifters and front derailleur with a 105 rear derailleur offer responsive, consistent shifting throughout the 20 gear combinations. FSA Omega Compact crankset with 50/34 chainrings is paired with a 12-30 cassette for a wide range of gearing for easy climbs and speed on the flats. DB Equation RS wheels are equipped with Michelin Dynamic Sport tires to supply good all-around performance. Please note that this bike includes composite test pedals: additional pedals sold separately. Specs on the Diamondback Century 3 Bike are subject to change.
short_description: With a comfort-oriented geometry, the 20-speed Diamondback Century 3 Bike combines comfort and speedy performance thanks to a carbon frame and dependable Shimano Tiagra components.
